Den här användaren har redan en giltig butik.
Det där butiksnamnet måste vara åtminstone 3 tecken långt.
That store name is already taken, you need to choose another one.
Invalid name given for your store. The name of a store can only have alphanumeric characters (A to Z and 0 to 9) or hyphens (-), and it cannot start nor end with a hyphen.
Your account has a store already. You cannot create another one under the same account
Invalid name given for your store. The name of a store can only have alphanumeric characters and it cannot start nor end with a hyphen.
A store already exists with the same name. Please give another name for your store.
The email provided is not registered yet
The store could not be created. Please try again.
